content: this legal document is from the district court in ljubljana slovenia the court made a decision on october 29 2021 in a case involving the division of assets among four heirs the total value of the assets is 5595500 eur including unpaid pension benefits a car funds in a bank account and a cash deposit each heir is entitled to a 14 share but adjustments were made based on their relationships the widow of the deceased is entitled to the entire share the court based its decision on the inheritance act and the civil procedure act the court received a death certificate and initiated succession proceedings the parties involved waived the inheritance hearing and made written declarations of acceptance the court assigned the respective shares of the inheritance to the heirs the heiress is responsible for paying a court fee of 61200 eur the heiress must arrange for the transfer of funds and property according to the final order and obtain a certificate of finality the text also explains the process of appealing a decision including the time frame and requirements for lodging an appeal the document concludes with the date of october 29 2021 in ljubljana

metadata.subject_of_succession: unpaid pension benefits, car Honda Jazz, funds on personal bank account, cash on deposit
